question: i wanted to know if a married couple is allowed to go around and sleep togeather in one room without ruksati being taken place?
answer:
QUESTION

assalmu alikum

 

i wanted to know if a married couple is allowed to go around and sleep togeather in one room without ruksati being taken place?

 

i wanted to know that my wife lives with her parents as ruksati is still no taken place due to country laws, who's hukm comes first the parent or the husbands

 

 

shukran

 

 

 

ANSWER


Share:

 

In the name of Allāh, Most Gracious, Most Merciful


Assalāmu ῾alaykum wa Rahmatullāhi Wabarakātuh

 

In principle the laws of marriage will apply after nikāh. However, it is below one’s dignity to go around or to sleep with one’s wife before rukhsati.

After nikāh you and your parents In-laws will have certain rights over your wife, so what do you mean by “hukm” Please clarify?

 

And Allāh Ta῾āla Knows Best
Wassalāmu ῾alaykum

 

Abduz Zaman,
Student Dārul Iftā
